CustomField.description: Used to indicate that a case is closed. Multiple statuses are considered closed and may be different by record type. Edited to no longer include RCI Case Statuses.
CustomField.formula: IF ( CASE ( TEXT ( Status__c ), 'Closed', 1 , 'Duplicate Case', 1 , 'Rejected', 1 , 'Closed By PAGA', 1 , 'Closed - JEU Referral', 1, 0 ) > 0, TRUE, FALSE )
CustomField.label: Closed
